intro: Ilyogeton scapigerum, commonly known as the slender false nettle, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Onagraceae. It is characterized by its slender, erect stems and opposite, ovate leaves with a slightly hairy surface. The plant produces small, yellowish-white flowers arranged in clusters, which are typically borne on slender pedicels. It is often found in moist, open habitats such as meadows and wetlands. Ilyogeton scapigerum is a herbaceous perennial that blooms from late spring to early summer.
